comments.author: Eduardo Pérez Ureta
comments.body: You may want first to commit a patch to remove whitespace at the end of the line and then apply this patch.

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Eduardo

If you want this patch applied you should also change other examples to make them consistent.

Oleg

comments.author: Eduardo Pérez Ureta
comments.body:
I missed httpmime example.
Any other example?

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
My bad. I did not look at the patch carefully enough. All examples seem there. I will review and apply the patch in the coming days.

Oleg

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Eduardo

Patches do not apply cleanly against the latest SVN trunk. Could you please create a new diff against the latest snapshot off the SVN trunk?

Oleg

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Patch checked in. Many thanks, Eduardo

Oleg

description: Java has exceptions so resources must always be closed on a finally clause
